amendment.description: Amendment stipulates that funding for the DOD specimen repository may only be used in accordance with applicable DOD policy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, printed as amendment No. 10 in the Congressional Record of June 12, 1996 to prohibit funds for the Defense Department DNA Data Bank for any purpose other than those established in current policy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kennedy (MA) amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
